name: Additional Intervals for WooCommerce Subscriptions
author: wpnomad

sections.description: By default, with WooCommerce Subscriptions you can charge recurring amount every 1st to 6th interval. This setting enables 7th to 13th interval option. This woudl be helpful where in cases such as requiring the recurring payment every 11th day or month, etc.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download the plugin and install it to your wp-content/plugins folder, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Navigate to WooCommerce → Settings → Subscriptions and scroll down to enable Additional Subscription Intervals.
